inputs.name: hasRoleAlert
inputs.text:
Indicates whether a role=alert is added to this ob-alert element at runtime.
This value overwrites the global configuration for this element.
It should only be used if immediate action is required by the user.

tokens.name: OBLIQUE_HAS_ROLE_ALERT
tokens.text:
The default value for the hasRoleAlert property that will be applied to all ObAlertComponent components throughout the module-tree.
It should only be used when immediate action is required by the user.
